      This method gets array of players in game.
      java.util.List<Player> Game.getWinnersByPoints()
      Figures out which player has won based on the total number of points:
      - Each minion on the board is worth five points.
      Methods in gameplay with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Game.addBuilding(Player player, BoardArea boardArea) 
      boolean BoardArea.addBuildingForPlayer(Player p)
      Adds a building to this board area for the given player.
      Note that a building cannot be added to an area that contains a trouble marker or already contains a building.
      void BoardArea.addMinion(Player p)
      This method adds the minion of the player in the city area, and justifies the balance of stocked minions.
      void Game.assignPersonality(Player p)
      Deal a player a personality card from deck.
      boolean Game.drawDiscardCards(Player player, int numberOfCards)
      If not asking for too many cards, draw these cards and assign to player
      void Game.drawPlayerCard(Player p, int i)
      Draws player cards.
      Adds the given player's hand size (i) if it is less than five.
      If no more player cards are available, the player's hand is left as it is at the time when the cards are up (the game should end after the player's turn is finished).
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,BoardArea> Game.getAreasWithPlayerMinions(Player player) 
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,BoardArea> Game.getBuildingAreas(Player player)
      Finds all buildings a player owns.
      int BoardArea.getMinionCountForPlayer(Player p)
      This method determines the number of minions of the player.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,BoardArea> Game.getMinionPlacementAreas(Player player) 
      int Game.getNumberOfAreasControlled(Player player)
      Returns the total number of areas controlled by the given player.
      An area is controlled by a player if (s)he "has more playing pieces in it than any single other player (a playing piece being a minion or a building) and has more pieces than the total number of trolls in the area".
      An area that has at least one demon cannot be controlled.
      int Game.getPlayerPoints(Player p)
      Retrieves the total number of points for the given player.
      - Each minion on the board is worth five points.
      int Game.getTotalMinionCountForPlayer(Player player)
      Retrieves the total number of minions for the given player on the game board.
      void Game.giveBankMoneyFromPlayer(Player p, int amount)
      Completes a transaction by taking money from the given player and storing it in the game's bank.
      void Game.givePlayerMoneyFromBank(Player p, int amount)
      Completes a transaction by giving money to the given player from the game's bank.
      boolean BoardArea.isControlledBy(Player p)
      Determines whether this board area is controlled by the given player.
      An area is controlled by a player if (s)he "has more playing pieces in it than any single other player (a playing piece being a minion or a building) and has more pieces than the total number of trolls in the area".
      An area that has at least one demon cannot be controlled.
      void Controller.performSymbolAction(Player p, Symbol s) 
      boolean Game.removeBuilding(Player p, int areaId)
      Removes a building on the area with the given ID, if one exists and also removes the corresponding city card form the player's hand.
      boolean Game.removeMinion(int areaID, Player player)
      Remove one minion belonging to the given player from the area with the given area ID.
      boolean BoardArea.removeMinion(Player p)
      This method removes the minion of the player from the city area, and justifies the balance of stocked minions.
      void Game.restorePlayerHand(Player p)
      Brings the given player's hand size back to 5 if it is less than that.
      If no more player cards are available, the player's hand is left as it is at the time when the cards are up (the game should end after the player's turn is finished).
      void Controller.restorePlayerHand(Player p)
